content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I have your name to get started?
Thanks, Mike. Could you please provide your address so we can check availability in your area?
Thank you. What type of service do you need help with today? For example, heating, cooling, or ventilation?

AC I guess. It's just not working right, keeps making noises and sometimes doesn't turn on. I don't know, it just sucks. I need someone to look at it but last time I had someone out they charged a crazy fee for nothing.
Got it, thank you for the details. Let me update your job description so we can match you with the right technician.
reason: Failed to gather job description accurately.

content: Hi Mike, this is Sarah from XYZ Home Services. Sorry about the hassle! I see you're having trouble with your ACâ€”it keeps making noises and sometimes doesn't turn on. I'd be happy to book a technician for you. May I know your preferred day and time for a visit? Also, I can give you a rough estimate for the visit so you'll know what to expect.
